UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that represents a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Insights into the functionality of the putative residues involved in enterocin AS-48 maturation.
Literature.Author: Cebrián R, Maqueda M, Neira JL, Valdivia E, Martínez-Bueno M, Montalbán-López M

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Arthrobacter sp.(MIC=6.25µg/ml),Bacillus cereus LWL 1(MIC=25µg/ml),Bacillus megaterium CECT 44(MIC=3.12µg/ml),Enterococcus faecalis JH-2-2(MIC=12.5µg/ml),Enterococcus faecalis S-47(MIC=12.5µg/ml),Listeria innocua CECT 4030(MIC=8µg/ml),Listeria monocytogenes CECT 4032(MIC=3.12µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus CECT 976(MIC=12.5µg/ml)
